title: Natsuiro Kiseki EP OVA
alternative_title: Natsu-iro Kiseki: 15-kaime no Natsuyasumi, 夏色キセキ ～15回目のナツヤスミ～
description: Natsumi, Saki, Yuka, and Ringo are best friends. They’ve grown up in an old agricultural town, experiencing everything together, both happy and sad. But one summer, they are visited by a miracle.
